component.name: GitButler
component.summary: Git branch management tool, built from the ground up for modern workflows

description.p: Source Code Management system designed to manage your branches, record and backup your work, be your Git client, help with your code and much more.
Add support for moving of commits between virtual branches
Fixes an issue where if gitignored files are changing frequently it may prevent changes to non-ignored files to show up in gb
Adds an option to copy PR urls to clipboard
Fixes wrapping of URLs in commit bodies
Adds the ability to discard entire files from virtual branch lanes
Fixes a UI bug with the position of the resizer
Minor UI style/color updates to cards
Fixes an issue where closing / hiding the window works incorrectly
Fixes a bug where links inside PR descriptions don’t open correctly
Confirmation of branch deletion will no longer be shown if branch is empty
Adds the ability to delete a project while away from gitbutler/integraion branch
Fixes an error occurring just after deleting a project
Removes the app tray menu as it doesn’t provide sufficient value
Adds the ability to show full commit messages on existing commits
Removes background fetches for non-active projects
Move comments to a rust FMT approved location
fix: dont send the content of large text files to the UI as it cant handle it
